message: Take it or leave it, Bob. This is my first and final offer.
Let's be reasonable, Bob.  I'm taking a smaller cut this time.  Accept this and we both get something.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm lowering my share again.  It's better to get something than nothing.
You're not serious about taking a fair share, Alice. I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect me to give away the farm!
Bob, this is my last offer. It's time to be realistic. We're running out of time, and if we don't reach an agreement, we both get nothing.
You're not going to get it all, Alice. I'm trying to be reasonable, but you're not meeting me halfway!
Bob, we're down to the wire.  Let's find a compromise before we lose everything.  This is my final offer.
I'm not going to give in completely, Alice. You're still not offering enough, but I'll try to meet you halfway.
Bob, it's time to split the pot evenly.  We're both stubborn, but this is the only way we both get something.  It's now or never.
